items.title: Tested: Baseus’ 245W Nomos 6-in-1 charging station is a capable desktop charger that can do it all
items.summary:
There’s no shortage of multi-device charging stations out there, but most force you to choose between wireless charging or USB-C ports for wired accessories like, say, a MacBook or an iPad. You usually get one or the other, which is a mildly annoying inconvenience Baseus is trying to resolve this with its new 245W Nomos charging station which we’re checking out today. This model packs two retractable cables, four USB-C ports, two USB-A ports, and a 15W Qi2 wireless charging pad. It’s touted to be an ultimate all-in-one solution for your desk, but does it actually deliver? I’ve been using it as my main desktop charging station for the past few weeks to see how it holds up, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

By way of its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering returning low prices on three of its popular smart locks – all with palm vein recognition. Things start with the base FamiLock E34 Smart Lock at $179.98 shipped, matching the direct website pricing, while the more advanced FamiLock S3 Smart Lock is down at $229.48 shipped (matching its direct pricing), and the most advanced FamiLock S3 Max Smart Lock at $279.98 shipped (matching its direct pricing). These three models usually go for $280, $350, and $400 at full price, respectively, which we last saw drop to these all-time low prices back during Christmas sales, while we also saw some shorter-term dips to these rates in early January. Now, you’re getting the first shot to grab them at their best prices in 2026, saving you $100 or $120 off the going rates.

items.title: EcoFlow Valentine’s Day sale drops DELTA 3 Plus power station and FREE bag bundle to new $599 low, more from $169
items.summary:
EcoFlow has launched a Valentine’s Day Sale that is continuing through the holiday and weekend and ending just before President’s Day, bolstering the deals we saw during its previous Super Bowl sale. One notable inclusion is EcoFlow’s DELTA 3 Plus Portable Power Station with a FREE protective bag at $599 shipped, after the automatic code is applied in your cart, beating out its Amazon pricing by $50 (which doesn’t include a bag). This is one of the rare cases where the direct website’s $799 MSRP beats out the starting price on other sites like Amazon, where it can be found starting from a $899 price tag, which we’ve seen go as low as $616 in past sales. Now, for the rest of the week, you can score a $200 markdown off the going rate, scoring it at the lowest new price we have tracked. Head below to learn more about bonus savings codes that aren’t eligible for the above bundle, as well as browse the sale’s full lineup.

items.title: Heads up! Samsung’s 2TB T7 Shield portable drive is seeing a rare $200 discount while SSD prices continue to skyrocket
items.summary:
Deals on SSDs have been hard to come by lately as the prices continue to skyrocket in 2026 due to the global memory shortage, but B&H is now offering a very rare $200 discount on Samsung’s T7 Shield portable drive – now down to $199.99 shipped with a $200 on-page coupon that auto-applies during checkout. This rare deal is a part of the retailer’s wider 3-day Mega Deal Zone sale event, and it takes $200 off the $400 price it has lately been fetching at Amazon and other retailers. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this unit in recent months since SSDs and memory modules started jumping up in price due to the global shortage. It’s completely sold out right now at Samsung, and it’s likely to go quickly at B&H, too, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

Alongside a host of ongoing Switch and PS5 game deals now live ahead of President’s Day 2026, we also wanted to add a few more titles to the list headlined by NBA 2K26. The Switch version is now down to $19.99 Prime shipped while the Switch 2 edition is selling for $24.99 Prime shipped. Originally $60 and typically closer to $30 or $40 as of late, both versions are now sitting at new Amazon all-time lows to join the rest of the early President’s Day game deals.

  • Silent Hill f $40 (Reg. $70)
